overview: George Cabot Jr., the son of a department store owner, enrolls Kristina Nielsen, the store's sports clerk,  at a university to use her as an advertisement for their fashion department. She falls for Larry Taylor, a teacher, and gets expelled.
tagline: A modern girl having a modern good time - swank clothes, swell dates, sweet romance - that's Sonja now, so dainty, so desirable, so incredible!
title: My Lucky Star
